$WmMPID_冬祭アネット,ch17_18_Annette_F_Winter22,Face|♪Winter festival bum-bum-bum!
It is going to be tons of fun!♪$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ドロテア,ch17_11_Dorothea_F_Winter22,Face|It's nice to see you enjoying yourself,
Annette. But I wonder if you're truly
taking advantage of this opportunity.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭アネット,ch17_18_Annette_F_Winter22,Face|Huh? What do you mean?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ドロテア,ch17_11_Dorothea_F_Winter22,Face|The gifts that people choose to give
are a reflection of their own taste
and personality.$k$pIt's a chance to learn a lot about the
people in your life, if you really take
the time to watch closely.$k$pYou could discover that your ideal
partner has been right under your
nose all this time! Isn't that exciting?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭アネット,ch17_18_Annette_F_Winter22,Face|Umm... Sure?$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_冬祭ドロテア,ch17_11_Dorothea_F_Winter22,Face|Look at that one over there. Great
taste in gifts, right? What do you
think, Annette?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭アネット,ch17_18_Annette_F_Winter22,Face|Uh... I guess? I don't think I really get
what we're looking for...$k$p$Sbs150|
